short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily Capture Videos From Your Users' Webcams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Even with the advancements in HTML5 there is still no simple way to collect videos from your users' webcams. That is why we built CameraTag. With one line of code you can easily start collecting videos for applications ranging from video-comments to talent competitions, political action, crowd sourced art and more.
